title: Chat Summary

content:

title: Research Discussion Summary
content: The team is exploring new AI model architectures. Discussion focused on transformer models and relevant research papers.

title: Research Papers Collection
content:
## Key Papers on Transformer Models

1. "Attention is All You Need" - Vaswani et al.
2. "BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers" - Devlin et al.
3. "GPT-3: Language Models are Few-Shot Learners" - Brown et al.

These papers provide foundational knowledge for your model architecture discussion.

title: Project Alpha Kickoff
content: Team started Project Alpha with component library setup completed by Alice. Discussion about API integration is underway.

title: API Integration Boilerplate
Design System Analysis
content:
## Design System Review

**Color Contrast:** All colors pass WCAG AA standards
**Component Consistency:** 95% consistency across mockups
**Accessibility Score:** 92/100

**Recommendations:**
- Add focus states to all interactive elements
- Increase touch target sizes on mobile
- Add alt text guidelines for images

title: Backend API v2 Status
content: Backend API v2 is ready for testing. Frontend integration testing is starting, and all database migrations have been completed successfully with passing tests.

title: API Documentation
content:
## API v2 Endpoints

### Authentication
- `POST /auth/login` - User login
- `POST /auth/logout` - User logout
- `POST /auth/refresh` - Refresh token

### Teams
- `GET /teams` - List all teams
- `POST /teams` - Create team
- `GET /teams/:id` - Get team details

### Messages
- `GET /teams/:id/messages` - Get team messages
- `POST /teams/:id/messages` - Send message
